cells.data:
import numpy as np
import theano.tensor as T
from theano import function
from theano import pp
from IPython.display import Image

# step1. define two symbols (Variables)
x = T.dscalar('x')
y = T.dscalar('y')

# step2. build symbolic expression (combine x and y into their sum z)
z = x + y

# step3. compile function
#        create a function taking x and y as inpputs and giving z as output
#        the first argument is a list of Variables that will be provided as inputs to the function
#        the second argument is a single Variable or a list of Variables
# f was being compliled into C code
f = function([x, y], z)
